AT.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
AT.description: Folge Lan und seinem Computer-Pendant Mega Man.EXE in ein weiteres Abenteuer im Cyberspace. Das Duo nimmt an einem NetBattle-Turnier teil, wo es von einer bösen Organisation erfährt, die die Herrschaft über das Netzwerk übernehmen will. Teils Rollen-, teils Strategiespiel; Megaman Battle Network 3 führt Mega Man über virtuelle Schlachtfelder, auf denen er Feinde besiegt und seine Fähigkeiten verbessert. Die White-Version bietet exklusive Giga-Class-Chips, und jede Version hat ihre eigenen unverwechselbaren Charaktere, Bosse und Überraschungen.

AU.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
AU.description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace. The pair enter a NetBattle tournament which leads them to uncover the plans of an evil organisation to take over the network. Part role-playing game, part strategy, Megaman Battle Network 3 involves guiding Mega Man through virtual battlegrounds, defeating enemies and upgrading his abilities. Exclusive to the White version are special Giga Class Chips, and each version has its own unique characters, bosses and surprises.

BG.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
BG.description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace. Part role-playing game, part strategy, Megaman Battle Network 3 involves guiding Mega Man through virtual battlegrounds, defeating enemies and upgrading his abilities. Exclusive to the White version are special Giga Class Chips, and each version has its own unique characters, bosses and surprises.

BE.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
BE.description: Rejoignez Lan et son alter ego cybernétique Mega Man.EXE pour une nouvelle aventure dans le cyberespace. En participant à un tournoi de NetBattle, le duo découvre les plans d'une organisation démoniaque pour conquérir le réseau. Mêlant jeu de rôle et stratégie, Megaman Battle Network 3 vous permet de guider Mega Man au travers de champs de bataille virtuels pour vaincre ses ennemis et augmenter ses capacités. En plus de personnages, boss et surprises uniques à chaque version, la version White possède en exclusivité des Giga Class Chips spéciaux.

ES.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
ES.description: Acompaña al intrépido Lan y a su homólogo cibernético Mega Man.EXE en esta nueva aventura por el ciberespacio. Ambos participan en el torneo NetBattle, que les lleva a descubrir los planes de una organización maligna para tomar el control de la red. Mitad juego de rol, mitad estrategia, en Megaman Battle Network 3 guiarás a Mega Man a través de campos de batalla virtuales, venciendo a enemigos y mejorando sus habilidades. La versión White incluye exclusivos Giga Class Chips especiales. Además, ¡cada versión contiene personajes, jefes y sorpresas únicos!

IT.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
IT.description: Unisciti all'eroico Lan e la sua controparte digitale Mega Man.EXE per un'avventura nel cyberspazio! Il duo partecipa al torneo NetBattle che li conduce a scoprire i piani di una malvagia organizzazione intenta a impadronirsi della rete. In Megaman Battle Network 3, in parte gioco di ruolo e in parte strategico, guiderai Mega Man attraverso campi di battaglia virtuali per sconfiggere i nemici e migliorare diverse abilità. Giga Class Chips speciali sono esclusiva della versione White; ogni versione ha personaggi, boss e soprese unici.

NO.description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace. NL.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
NL.description: Sluit je aan bij de heldhaftige Lan en zijn virtuele alter ego Mega Man.EXE voor een volgend avontuur in cyberspace. Het duo doet mee aan een NetBattle-toernooi waar ze de plannen ontrafelen van een kwaadaardige organisatie die het netwerk over wil nemen. In Megaman Battle Network 3, deels RPG, deels strategiespel, leid je Mega Man door virtuele slagvelden, versla je vijanden en verbeter je zijn vaardigheden. De speciale Giga Class Chips zijn exclusief voor de White-versie. Elke variant heeft zijn eigen unieke personages, eindbazen en verrassingen.

NZ.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
NZ.description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace. The pair enter a NetBattle tournament which leads them to uncover the plans of an evil organisation to take over the network. Part role-playing game, part strategy, Megaman Battle Network 3 involves guiding Mega Man through virtual battlegrounds, defeating enemies and upgrading his abilities. Exclusive to the White version are special Giga Class Chips, and each version has its own unique characters, bosses and surprises.

PL.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
PL.description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace. Part role-playing game, part strategy, Megaman Battle Network 3 involves guiding Mega Man through virtual battlegrounds, defeating enemies and upgrading his abilities. Exclusive to the White version are special Giga Class Chips, and each version has its own unique characters, bosses and surprises.

PT.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
PT.description: Junta-te ao heróico Lan e ao seu companheiro virtual, Mega Man.EXE, para uma aventura no ciberespaço. O duo entra num torneiro NetBattle onde acaba por descobrir os planos de uma organização malvada para assumir o controlo da rede. Parte RPG, parte jogo de estratégia, Megaman Battle Network 3 permite-te guiares o Mega Man através de arenas de batalha virtuais, derrotar inimigos e melhorar as suas habilidades. A versão White tem Giga Class Chips especiais exclusivos. Cada versão tem as suas personagens, inimigos e surpresas únicas!

RU.name: Megaman Battle Network 3 White
RU.description: Окунитесь в новые приключения в киберпространстве вместе с Ланом и его компьютерным двойником Mega Man.EXE. Напарники принимают участие в турнире NetBattle, в ходе которого они разоблачают план злой организации по захвату сети. Megaman Battle Network 3 объединяет элементы ролевой игры и стратегии, в которой Mega Man сражается с врагами на виртуальных полях боя и улучшает свои способности. Особенностью White версии игры являются особые Giga Class Chips, а также уникальные персонажи, боссы и т.п.
